subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Shooting (Sport)
lead_paragraph: Brenda Shinn is an unlikely Olympic athlete, making the shooting team after taking a 24-year break from her sport, returning in 2006 after her son left for college.
snippet: Brenda Shinn is an unlikely Olympic athlete, making the shooting team after taking a 24-year break from her sport, returning in 2006 after her son left for college.
